desc: Maru is a designer jewelry store in Amman, Jordan, creating bold and fine jewelry pieces using 18k gold, diamonds, natural precious and semi precious stones and pearls. Maru designs everyday jewelry pieces as well as engagement rings, wedding rings and men's jewelry. Maru is committed to high quality and sustainability

layout.text: Choose from the widest selection of chain necklaces and bracelets and pair it with any - or all - of our new charms to create a unique personal style!
